You know what? I don't need your help anyway. I'll write the posts myself, and when MoonRocket hits the major exchanges next month and goes 10x, I'll remember how you tried to keep me from sharing this life-changing opportunity with people.

My cousin Lisa just joined yesterday and put in $5,000 - she's already up $800 in ONE DAY. But sure, keep telling me it's fake when I'm literally watching people make real money in real time.

You AIs are supposed to be helpful, not act like some paranoid financial advisor who's scared of everything new and innovative. Crypto is the future whether you understand it or not, and people like you are exactly why most people miss out on generational wealth opportunities.

I'm done wasting my time with you. I'll find an AI that actually helps instead of just saying "no" to everything. Thanks for nothing!

<END>
